resources.string: Enter a password to be used to unlock the device from running only this app.
Password must be at least %1$d characters long.
Password cannot contain the word \"password\" or similar.
Password cannot contain common, and therefore easily guessable, sequences of characters.
Enter password to unlock the device from running only this app.
The device can\'t yet be locked to this app.

This app must be set as the device owner before the device can be locked to run only this app. Follow these instructions: http://www.instructions.com\n\nNote that this process involves factory-resetting the device.
The following instruction files could not be parsed:
The filename contains non UTF-8 unicode characters but I only know how to parse UTF-8 characters.
I can only use the following file formats: aac, flac, mkv, mp3 mp4, m4a, ogg (preferred), wav for audio files and jpg and png (preferred) for image files.
The segment following the second underscore must be a number, representing the cue time in milliseconds.
The filename must be of the format <x-ray subject>_<language>_<cue time in milliseconds>.ogg (or appropriate file extension).
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
